page.title: 03PEOPLE'S JOBS IN HARDWICK
page.content: Acre upon acre of grassland and crops dominate the area and so it comes as no surprise that many of its inhabitants are{farmers}and their families, many of them continuing a long family tradition. However, a substantial proportion of the population are{business people. Obviously, this is a result of the motorway which provides ready access to towns and cities outside the area. Several{school teachers}also live within the area, although there are no schools! The collieries nearby and the fact that there was once mining in the area accounts for the presence of existing and retired{miners}within the population. A number of estate cottages are occupied by National Trust staff.
